body:
This should absolutely work. Can you please post your cross compilation
setup, flag, and everything else, plus the final binary you got.

On Tue, Dec 1, 2015 at 3:11 PM, Matt Aimonetti <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Fair enough, so it looks like the issue is that I cross compiled my
> program from a Mac and executed it on Windows. I guess this might be a bit
> problematic, I was under the impression that cross compiling would build an
> binary with identical behaviors as if it was build on the target platform.
> I guess I misunderstood, thanks
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/13437#issuecomment-160847445>.
>
